label: ham
subject: Not Understanding TGE
body: 30 (return) [ See in the MŽmoires de lÕAcadŽmie, tom. xxxv p. 747-758, a dissertation of M. dÕAnville on the extent of Constantinople. He takes the plan inserted in the Imperium Orientale of Banduri as the most complete; but, by a series of very nice observations, he reduced the extravagant proportion of the scale, and instead of 9500, determines the circumference of the city as consisting of about 7800 French _toises_.]
